# OpenBB Docs - workspace

## Docs

- [Overview](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/ai-agents): Learn how to integrate and customize AI agents in OpenBB Workspace for enhanced financial analysis and research capabilities
- [AI Generated](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/ai-generated): Learn how to use AI agent outputs as widgets in your OpenBB dashboard
- [Apps](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/apps): Create and customize your own OpenBB Apps for optimized workflows
- [apps.json Reference](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/apps-json-reference): Learn about the structure and configuration of apps.json for creating custom applications in OpenBB Workspace
- [Core Widgets](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/core-widgets): Master OpenBB's essential widgets for building powerful financial dashboards, including navigation, notes, API integration, and real-time data visualization tools.
- [Overview](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/data-integration): Learn how to integrate your own data sources and APIs into OpenBB Workspace with a custom backend solution.
- [AgGrid Table Charts](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/data-widgets/aggrid-table-charts): AgGrid Table Charts
- [File Viewer](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/data-widgets/file-viewer): Guide to using PDF and multi-PDF viewer widgets in OpenBB Workspace
- [Highcharts Chart](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/data-widgets/highcharts): Learn how to create Highcharts widgets for OpenBB Workspace, with step-by-step instructions for backend integration, configuration, and theme support.
- [Data Widgets](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/data-widgets/index): Build powerful financial dashboards with OpenBB Workspace's flexible widget system
- [Live Grid](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/data-widgets/live-grid): Create a real-time data grid widget for OpenBB Workspace that displays live updates in a table format
- [Markdown](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/data-widgets/markdown): Learn how to create and customize markdown widgets in OpenBB Workspace, including basic markdown display and data-rich markdown with dynamic content integration.
- [Metric](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/data-widgets/metric): Learn how to integrate your own backend with OpenBB Workspace using the cookie-cutter or language-agnostic API approaches, with illustrative guides and principles for handling widget.json files, APIs, interfaces, Python, FastAPI, and more.
- [Newsfeed](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/data-widgets/newsfeed): Learn how to create a newsfeed widget for OpenBB Workspace that displays articles in a clean, organized format.
- [Omni](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/data-widgets/omni): Learn how to create versatile Omni widgets for OpenBB Workspace that can dynamically return different content types based on input parameters.
- [Plotly Charts](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/data-widgets/plotly-charts): Plotly Charts
- [TradingView Charts](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/data-widgets/tradingview-charts): How to implement TradingView charts in OpenBB using UDF (Universal Data Feed)
- [Enterprise](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/enterprise): Comprehensive guide to OpenBB Workspace Enterprise features, including role-based access control, security compliance, team collaboration, and on-premises deployment capabilities.
- [FAQs](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/faqs): Comprehensive guide to frequently asked questions about OpenBB Workspace data integration, custom backend setup, widget configuration, and troubleshooting common issues.
- [Apps Gallery](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/gallery): Browse our curated collection of apps for financial analysis, market research, portfolio management and much more.
- [Overview](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/index): OpenBB Workspace is a secure enterprise UI platform for AI workflows, featuring data integration, AI model deployment, flexible UI customization, and on-premises deployment capabilities.
- [Native Installation (PWA)](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/installation): Learn how to install and use OpenBB Workspace as a Progressive Web App (PWA) on your desktop and mobile devices.
- [OpenBB Copilot](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/openbb-copilot): Learn how to use OpenBB Copilot to interact with the OpenBB Workspace
- [OpenBB Platform](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/platform-installer): Learn how to integrate the OpenBB Platform data to OpenBB Workspace
- [Static Files](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/static-files): Learn how to import and manage static files in OpenBB, including structured and unstructured data formats, with support for PDF, CSV, JSON, PNG, and JPG files.
- [Categories and Subcategories](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-configuration/category-subcategory): Learn how to organize widgets using categories and subcategories in OpenBB Workspace.
- [Error Handling](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-configuration/error-handling): Learn how to handle errors in your widgets in OpenBB Workspace.
- [Grid Size](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-configuration/grid-size): Learn about the grid-based layout system for widgets in OpenBB Workspace, including width and height specifications.
- [Refetch Interval](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-configuration/refetch-interval): Learn about configuring refetch intervals for widgets in OpenBB Workspace.
- [Render Functions](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-configuration/render-functions): Learn how to configure and use custom render functions in OpenBB Workspace to customize data display and interactions.
- [Run Button](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-configuration/run-button): Learn about the run button functionality in OpenBB Workspace widgets.
- [Stale Time](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-configuration/stale-time): Learn about configuring stale time for widgets in OpenBB Workspace.
- [Advanced Dropdown](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-parameters/advanced-dropdown): Learn how to implement and use advanced dropdown parameters in OpenBB Workspace widgets, including dynamic options from endpoints and additional information display
- [Boolean Toggle](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-parameters/boolean-toggle): Learn how to implement and use boolean toggle parameters in OpenBB Workspace widgets, including configuration options and example usage
- [Cell Click Grouping](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-parameters/cell-click-grouping): Learn how to implement cell click grouping in OpenBB Workspace widgets, allowing users to click on cells in a table to update related widgets
- [Date Picker](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-parameters/date-picker): Learn how to implement and use date picker parameters in OpenBB Workspace widgets, including configuration options and example usage
- [Dependent Dropdown](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-parameters/dependent-dropdown): Learn how to implement and use dependent dropdown parameters in OpenBB Workspace widgets, where options in one dropdown depend on the selection in another
- [Dropdown](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-parameters/dropdown): Learn how to implement and use dropdown parameters in OpenBB Workspace widgets, including configuration options and example usage
- [Input Form](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-parameters/input-form): Input Form
- [Number Input](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-parameters/number-input): Learn how to implement and use number input parameters in OpenBB Workspace widgets, including configuration options and example usage
- [Parameter Grouping](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-parameters/parameter-grouping): Learn how to implement parameter grouping in OpenBB Workspace widgets, allowing multiple widgets to share and respond to the same parameter input
- [Parameter Positioning](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-parameters/parameter-positioning): Learn how to control the layout and positioning of widget parameters in OpenBB Workspace, including row positioning and parameter ordering
- [Text Input](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widget-parameters/text-input): Learn how to implement and use text input parameters in OpenBB Workspace widgets, including configuration options and example usage
- [widgets.json Reference](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-json-reference): Learn how to integrate your own backend with OpenBB Workspace using the cookie-cutter or language-agnostic API approaches, with illustrative guides and principles for handling widget.json files, APIs, interfaces, Python, FastAPI and more.
- [Crypto](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/crypto/index): <NewReferenceCard
- [Live Watchlist](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/crypto/pyth_price_feeds): Live price data for crypto, forex, stocks and commodities.
- [Crypto Coins Heatmap](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/crypto/tv_crypto_coins_heatmap): This widget gives you a birds-eye view of crypto. Segment by type of coin, market cap, recent performance and more.
- [Crypto Interactive Indicators Screener](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/crypto/tv_crypto_screener): Separate the wheat from the chaff with this embeddable Screener - handy for sorting symbols both by fundamental and technical indicators.
- [Cryptocurrency Market](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/crypto/tv_cryptocurrency_market): This widget displays crypto assets and then sorts them by their market capitalization.
- [Currency Snapshot](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/currency/currency_snapshot): Provides a snapshot of currency data including current rates and changes.
- [Currency](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/currency/index): <NewReferenceCard
- [Country Indicators](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/economy/country_indicators): Overview of economic indicators for a given country, including GDP, producer prices, CPI, unemployment, retail trade, government balance, current account balance, international investment, long term yield and industrial production.
- [Economic Indicators](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/economy/economic_indicators): Comprehensive overview of economic indicators.
- [Economic Overview](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/economy/economic_overview): Overview of a country's historical economic indicators, such as GDP, unemployment rate, population, and more.
- [Economy](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/economy/index): <NewReferenceCard
- [Upcoming Economic Events](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/economy/tv_upcoming_economic_events): Keep an eye on key upcoming economic events, announcements, and news. Plus, set up filters in a few clicks, selecting for event importance and affected currencies.
- [Yield Curve](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/economy/yield_curve): Sovereign debt yield curve data by country. Table will show the latest date available for the selected country and have Date, Maturity and Rate columns.
- [Price Target By Analyst](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/analyst_price_target): Breakdown of price targets set by individual analysts for a particular stock, including ratings and rating changes.
- [Company Filings](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/company_filings): Links for a company's historical SEC Filings.
- [Ticker Profile](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/company_profile): Detailed information about a company, including sector, employees, address, exchange, and IPO date.
- [Dividend Payment](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/dividend_payment): Historical stock dividend payments, including the adjusted dividend, record date, payment date, and declaration date.
- [Earnings History](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/earning_history): Historical earnings data and estimates, such as EPS and Revenue, for each quarter.
- [Earnings Calendar](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/earnings_calendar_quartr): Gets a list of symbols and related information for earnings events for the date range specified
- [Earnings Transcripts](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/earnings_transcripts): Complete transcripts of earnings calls, providing in-depth insights into financial performance and corporate updates.
- [Earnings Transcripts](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/earnings_transcripts_quartr): Complete transcripts of earnings calls, providing in-depth insights into financial performance and corporate updates.
- [Historical Stock Price](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/eod_price): Historical stock price data, including open, high, low, close, volume, etc.
- [Financial Ratios](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/financial_ratios): Company financial ratios about liquidity, efficiency, profitability, leverage, coverage and operating cashflow.
- [Financial Statements](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/financial_statements): Income, balance, and cash flow statements
- [Comparison Analysis](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/grouped_comparison): Analyze and compare financial ratios and metrics of a company and its peers, including EBITDA, quick ratio, liquidity, efficiency, profitability, leverage, coverage, operating cash flow, free cash flow, and profit margin.
- [Equity](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/index): <NewReferenceCard
- [Insider Trading](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/insider_trading): Recent stock transactions from company insiders.
- [Institutional Ownership](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/institutional_ownership): Institutional investment changes in shares and ownership percentage by quarter.
- [Key Metrics](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/key_metrics): Key stock metrics such as beta, average volume, market cap, high and low of 52-week range, dividend yield and P/E ratio.
- [Management Team](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/management_team): Details about the management team of a company, including name, title, and compensation.
- [Price performance](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/price_performance): Interactive chart for asset historical price data.
- [Price Target](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/price_target): Comparison chart of analyst price targets against a stock's close price.
- [Revenue Per Business Line](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/revenue_per_bus_line): Revenue breakdown by product category
- [Revenue Per Geography](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/revenue_per_geography): A breakdown of a company's revenue by geographical region.
- [Share Statistics](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/share_statistics): Share statistics such as free float, float shares, and outstanding shares.
- [Stock Ownership](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/stock_ownership): Percentage of shares owned by major holders
- [Stock Splits](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/stock_splits): Historical data on stock splits for a given company.
- [Ticker Information](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/ticker_information): Information about a particular asset such as price, volume, industry, country, etc.
- [Company Profile](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/tv_company_profile): Company description along with key categories - sector & industry.
- [Fundamental Data](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/tv_fundamental_data): Kick the tires on the fundamentals with this deep dive into how a company is doing beyond simply its stock price.
- [Stock Heatmap](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/tv_stock_heatmap): This widget shows off a macro view on global stocks. Perfect for segmenting by sector, country or market cap.
- [Exchange Gainers and Losers](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/tv_stock_market): See the top five gaining, losing, and most active stocks for the day. It updates based on current market activity - so you'll always see the most relevant stocks.
- [Technical Analysis Gauge](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/tv_ta): See what the technical analysis says about a given symbol with our display ratings, made for easy viewing.
- [Company Timeline](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/tv_timeline): Help your audience keep track of what's happening in a particular company - designed to be read in 20 seconds or less.
- [Valuation Multiples](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/equity/valuation_multiples): Valuation Multiples such as P/E, P/S, P/B, EV/Sales, EV/EBITDA, and Dividend Yield.
- [Forex](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/forex/index): <NewReferenceCard
- [Real-time Cross Rates](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/forex/tv_forex_cross_rates): Display real-time quotes of selected currencies in comparison to other major currencies.
- [Real-time Heatmap](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/forex/tv_forex_heatmap): Show off a snapshot of currency market action. This widget lets you spot strong and weak currencies and see how they compare to each other, all in real-time.
- [Forex Interactive Indicators Screener](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/forex/tv_forex_screener): Separate the wheat from the chaff with this embeddable Screener - handy for sorting symbols both by fundamental and technical indicators.
- [Widgets Library](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/index): <NewReferenceCard
- [Index](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/index/index): <NewReferenceCard
- [Market Overview](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/index/market_indices): Stock market overview with recent price change for indices or stocks.
- [Main Stories](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/news/big_stories): Two main news from around the world
- [Company News](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/news/company_news): News articles, including events or announcements related to a particular company.
- [Global News](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/news/global_news): News from around the world related with business, finance and economy.
- [News](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/news/index): <NewReferenceCard
- [Options](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/options/index): <NewReferenceCard
- [Options Chains EOD](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/options/options_chains_eod): Get the complete options chain for a ticker.
- [Charting](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/charting): Interactive tradingview charting of time series data.
- [Clock](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/clock): Display the time from various timezones
- [Iframe / Website](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/iframe): Embed a website
- [Others](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/index): <NewReferenceCard
- [Navigation Bar](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/navigation_bar): Create nested tabs inside the main tab for navigation.
- [Note](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/rich_note): Create a text widget
- [RSS Feeds](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/rss_viewer): View and manage RSS feeds
- [Advanced Real-time Chart Widget](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/tv_charting): Here's a free and powerful chart for you to easily embed onto any website. Make it yours with a ton of different customization options.
- [Global Market Performance](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/tv_market_data): Grab an overview of global markets performance, including change values, Open, High, Low, and Close values for selected financial instruments.
- [Macro Market Overview](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/tv_market_overview): Built for when you need to take a macro look at the markets.
- [Market Timeline](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/tv_market_timeline): Help your audience keep track of what's happening in your market of interest - designed to be read in 20 seconds or less.
- [Mini Charting](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/tv_mini_chart): This little one lets you see a symbol's price and change percentages, alongside an even more stripped-back chart view.
- [Real-time Ticker Value](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/tv_single_ticker): See the price and change percentage of your preferred symbol. Nothing else.
- [Symbol Info](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/tv_symbol_info): Scan key symbol info in an easy-to-read format. Company financials and quotes are also available at a glance.
- [Symbols Overview](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/tv_symbol_overview): Embed the latest quotes, plus a simple chart of a simple, single stock.
- [Ticker Performance](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/tv_ticker): Grab a horizontal glance at important instrument stats.
- [Ticker Tape Performance](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/tv_ticker_tape): Go all vintage Wall Street with our scrolling ticker tape.
- [Watchlist](https://docs.openbb.co/workspace/widgets-library/others/watchlist): Watchlist of multiple stocks including last price, period change such as day, month and year, P/E ratio and market cap.
